metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6967 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: xrdp 0.9.1 calls the PAM function auth_start_session() in an incorrect location, leading to PAM session modules not being properly initialized, with a potential consequence of incorrect configurations or elevation of privileges, aka a pam_limits.so bypass. It was discovered that PAM incorrectly initialized session modules. This could potentially bypass enforcement of limits.

criterions.comment: xrdp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
